title: Pomodoro Timer
description: This simple easy-to-use Pomodoro Timer App helps the user breakdown work into intervals

title: Random Quote Machine
description: This simple web app generates a random quote and allows the user to tweet the quote via twitter

title: Markdown Previewer
description: This is the Markdown editor with live preview, using the marked.js

title: Movie Web App
description: This is a IMDB style Movie App based on The Movie DB API

title: Calculator
description: Calculator is a simple application to perform basic math calculations.

title: Google Book Finder
description: Find Google books with just one search,user can search for book titles based on authors, topics, or titles

title: Music Drum Kit
description: A very easy to use virtual drum machine. user can play the sound of electronic drums online

title: Local Weather App
description: This simple weather application allows users to know the current forecast

title: Fun Memory Game
description: This is a memory game where the user needs to flip tiles then match pairs of tiles with the same number

title: Stop watch
description: This is a simple stopwatch with a stop and start feature

title: Documentation Page
description: This documentation page was submitted for the freeCodeCamp Responsive Web Design certification

title: Tribute Page
description: This page is a Tribute to the Missile Man of India Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam
